report.title: Locations verification breakdown (filterable)
report.description: Verification breakdown by indexed locality with standard filters.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join index_locations_samples ils on ils.sample_id=o.sample_id join locations l on l.id=ils.location_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter#

column.name: pending
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'C' then o.id else null end)

column.name: verified
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'V' then o.id else null end)

column.name: queried
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'D' then o.id when 'S' then o.id else null end)

column.name: rejected
column.sql: count(case record_status when 'R' then o.id else null end)
